description: This file is a React component for the employer's jobs management page in a Next.js application. It handles fetching, displaying, and managing jobs posted by an employer, including actions like closing jobs and navigating to related pages.

methods.name: EmployerJobsPage
methods.description: Main React component rendering the employer's job management interface.

methods.name: fetchJobs
methods.description: Asynchronous function fetching the list of jobs from the API and updating local state.
